style.name: wxTB_FLAT
style.description: Gives the toolbar a flat look (Windows and GTK only).

style.name: wxTB_DOCKABLE
style.description: Makes the toolbar floatable and dockable (GTK only).

style.name: wxTB_TEXT
style.description: Shows the text in the toolbar buttons; by default only icons are shown.

style.name: wxTB_NOICONS
style.description: Specifies no icons in the toolbar buttons; by default they are shown.

style.name: wxTB_NODIVIDER
style.description: Specifies no divider (border) above the toolbar (Windows only)

style.name: wxTB_NOALIGN
style.description: Specifies no alignment with the parent window (Windows only, not very useful).

style.name: wxTB_HORZ_LAYOUT
style.description: Shows the text and the icons alongside, not vertically stacked (Windows and GTK 2 only). This style must be used with wxTB_TEXT.

style.name: wxTB_NO_TOOLTIPS
style.description: Don't show the short help tooltips for the tools when the mouse hovers over them.

style.name: wxTB_BOTTOM
style.description: Align the toolbar at the bottom of parent window.

style.name: wxTB_RIGHT
style.description: Align the toolbar at the right side of parent window.

size.name: Bitmap size
size.description: Size of toolbar bitmaps (default: not set).

int.name: Separation
int.description: Default separator size, see wxToolBar::SetToolSeparation() (default: not set).

size.name: Don't attack to frame
size.description: If set to 0 and the toolbar object is child of a wxFrame, wxFrame::SetToolBar() is called; otherwise, you have to add it to a frame manually. The toolbar is attached by default, you have to set this property to 1 to disable this behaviour (default: 0).

event.name: EVT_TOOL
event.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_CLICKED event (a synonym for wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED). Pass the id of the tool.

event.name: EVT_TOOL_RANGE
event.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_CLICKED event for a range of identifiers. Pass the ids of the tools.

event.name: EVT_TOOL_RCLICKED
event.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_RCLICKED event. Pass the id of the tool. (Not available on wxOSX.)

event.name: EVT_TOOL_RCLICKED_RANGE
event.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_RCLICKED event for a range of ids. Pass the ids of the tools. (Not available on wxOSX.)

event.name: EVT_TOOL_ENTER
event.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_ENTER event. Pass the id of the toolbar itself. The value of wxCommandEvent::GetSelection() is the tool id, or -1 if the mouse cursor has moved off a tool. (Not available on wxOSX.)

event.name: EVT_TOOL_DROPDOWN
event.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_DROPDOWN_CLICKED event. If unhandled, displays the default dropdown menu set using wxToolBar::SetDropdownMenu().
